convert data type between raster and gdal conventions

FUNCTION_DESCRIPTION

convert_rastdtype(dtype_string, type)

Arguments

dtype_string

character data type string (e.g., Int16, ecc)
type

character - either "gdal" or "raster"

Value

tibble containing the representation of the data type both for gdal and raster

Examples

 in_dtype <- "INT1U"
 convert_rastdtype(in_dtype, "raster")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 2
#>    gdal raster
#>   <chr>  <chr>
#> 1  Byte  INT1U

 in_dtype <- "Float64"
 convert_rastdtype(in_dtype, "gdal")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 2
#>      gdal raster
#>     <chr>  <chr>
#> 1 Float64  FLT8S

 in_dtype <- "Float123"
 convert_rastdtype(in_dtype, "gdal")
#> Error in convert_rastdtype(in_dtype, "gdal"): 
#> get_rast_dtype --> in_dtype is not a recognized gdal format.
#>             
#> Aborting !
